title: Which member of BlackPink do you relate to most? - Quora

response.answer_text: Definitely Lisa, I'm obviously not as good as her but I can memorize dance steps pretty quickly.  (BTW I have a YouTube channel for all you K-pop lovers so go check it out and don't forget to subscribe, its ‘’Min Shook Gi’’ love ya guysss annyeong.)

Lisa I say this because Lisa is a bit jumpy and I can relate to that. She seems so caring and she seems like a hard worker. Lisa has also inspired me to audition for JYP! I’m not Korean. Nor do I speak it. But I am willing to learn it. I’m willing to work my way through it. And I’m pretty young.
